revision.text:
'''Alola''' is the seventh [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 125 Pokémon from Rowlet #722 to Zeraora #807 [[File:Alola Town Map 0.9.1.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Alola region]] ===[[Towns & Cities#Alola|Towns, Cities]], and [[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Hau'oli City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Roadside Motel]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Exeggutor Island]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Altar of the Sunne and Moone]] |- |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! '''Alola''' is the seventh [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 125 Pokémon from Rowlet #722 to Zeraora #807 [[File:Alola Town Map 0.9.1.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Alola region]] ===[[Towns & Cities#Alola|Towns, Cities]], and [[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Hau'oli City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Roadside Motel]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Exeggutor Island]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Altar of the Sunne and Moone]] |- |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! '''Alola''' is the seventh [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 125 Pokémon from Rowlet #722 to Zeraora #807 [[File:Alola Town Map 0.9.1.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Alola region]] ===[[Towns & Cities#Alola|Towns, Cities]], and [[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Hau'oli City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Roadside Motel]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Exeggutor Island]] || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Altar of the Sunne and Moone]] |- |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !
